title.narrative: Water Phase 3 - Climate Resilient Infrastructure Development Facility

description.narrative: This activity (Water Phase 3 - Climate Resilient Infrastructure Development Facility) is a component of Regional Transboundary Water Resources Programme - Phase 3 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £21,603,795. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): River basins development, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, WYG International. The start date is 08-05-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - water resources management
Aid to civil society organisations / NGOs
